title: PSA and SGC T206 HOFers for sale (ALL SOLD!!!)

posts.post_title: PSA and SGC T206 HOFers for sale (ALL SOLD!!!)
posts.post_content:
Hi all,
I am trying to put some money together tonight to finalize a deal.  Paypal is prefered.  Take the remaining for $310!
Thanks,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]

Fred Clarke Port SC 150 $85 SOLDDDD (mark on back, see scan)
H Jennings SOVEREIGN 350 PSA 3 $120 SOLDDDD
Bobby Wallace SOVEREIGN 350 PSA 3 $120 (little bit of baccie juice) SOLDDDD

3 Finger Brown Port P150 $180 (super nice for the grade)  SOLDDDD
Clark Griffith Bat SC 350 SGC 40 $100 SOLDDDD
Rube Marquard SC 150 Factory 25 SGC 50 $165 SOLDDDDD
Joe McGinnity P350 $90  SOLDDDDD
